member.summary: Specify if the window will get a blur background in win10. To enable this feature, pls make sure your Background prop is not solid. Set this value to false if u don't need this feature. The default value is true.

member.summary: Create and init ModernMessageBox

The system sound to play in the messageBox. If you leave it null, it will set to SoundFor(headIcon). if you want to play no sound, set SoundToPlay prop to null after construct

member.summary: Common usage of ModernMessageBox, Just like using in WPF or using QMessageBox in QT

member.name: P:ModernMessageBoxLib.QModernMessageBox.GlobalParentWindow
member.summary: Get or set the default owner of the MessageBoxWindow

member.name: P:ModernMessageBoxLib.QModernMessageBox.MainLang
member.summary: Get or set the text of the buttons The default value is in English. If you want other language, you should specify them manully

member.name: P:ModernMessageBoxLib.QModernMessageBox.GlobalBackground
member.summary: Specify the default Background for ModernMessageBox You can specify a transparent or half-transparent value in this field. If the operate system is Win10, The window will get a Blur background. The default value is Black,0.6 Opacity

member.name: P:ModernMessageBoxLib.QModernMessageBox.GlobalForeground
member.summary: Specify the default Foreground for ModernMessageBox The default value is White

member.name: P:ModernMessageBoxLib.QModernMessageBox.GlobalEnableWindowBlur
member.summary: Specify if the window will get a blur background in win10. To enable this feature, pls make sure your Background prop is not solid. Set this value to false if u don't need this feature. The default value is true.
